stories.text:
I just fat finger flagged something on the front page. I didn’t notice fast enough to catch which poor story I had falsely accused of being codswallop.

I’d love to be able to undo this action. It would help me sleep better at night!
stories.title: Ask HN: Unflag

stories.text:
Hello HN :)

I am an enrolled in a capstone course this academic term and my group and I are brainstorming ideas for some program/software to make. I thought to ask the community for some ideas. The only requirement the professor asks for is that the project is legal :)

We are open to ideas from any field/domain/application. Ideas can be a part of a bigger project like developing a startup or smaller like a calculator or anything in between.
stories.title: Ask HN: Capstone Course Project Ideas?
Mozilla SOPS is looking for new maintainers
Could Germany's obsession with homeopathy explain the low vaccination rate?
Walmart orders 5k electric delivery vans from GM's BrightDrop
Former NASA Scientist Explains How We Could Terraform Mars
How Fast Does Scientific Disagreement and Support Happen?

stories.text:
Are you interested by an asset allocation web app that would bring:
Clear visibility of underlying assumptions
Sourcing of best economic sources
Metrics in line with real life of your portfolio (money you may lose)
?
How much would you pay for such service?
stories.title: Asset Allocation
